pageContext.claim: “We're not letting people into our country illegally. And we're not doing a release. We'll do a catch, but we're not doing releases. So if they think they're going to be released into our country like in the old days -- like for years and years, they catch and release -- we're not releasing. They don't get released.”
pageContext.analysis: This is misleading. Trump says that asylum seekers are being detained and cannot be released but some are released after a brief period in detention.
